journal reviews books about connect submit



2 Cat Stories

by S Kay on October 1, 2015




Post-Partum
After her baby was born, her family wouldn’t talk about the post-partum psychosis. Every time she put the cat to bed they switched the baby.

Whose Pet
Knowing she is an android, she’s fiercely proud to live alone. Learning she was purchased and registered by her cat is the surprise.



2 Cat Stories - October 1, 2015 -
